definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: Capsule valves longitudinally vittate to abaxially vittate with lateral vesicles.
sentences.chinese: 蒴果縱向裂片具油道到背面具油道具側小泡。

sentences.english: A charter is a mask; the lie lurks beneath it.
sentences.chinese: 憲章是個假面具，蓋在那下面的是謊話。

sentences.english: Smoke escape emergency respirator masks are available in a wide variety of prices and weights.
sentences.chinese: 可以買到很多種價錢和重量的緊急防毒面具。

sentences.english: One of the men from that group staying here wore a mask over his face.
sentences.chinese: 住在這裏的他們中的一個人臉上還戴有面具。

sentences.english: And the "Scream" mask has become a classic Halloween costume.
sentences.chinese: “驚聲尖叫”面具也成爲經典萬聖節裝飾。

sentences.english: They are the perfect masters of disguise; wearing masks of calm and collected beings.
sentences.chinese: 他們是僞裝大師，頭戴一副冷靜的面具收集信息。

sentences.english: However, Mask-bot is not yet able to understand much of the spoken word.
sentences.chinese: 然而，面具機器人尚未能理解大多數的口語。

sentences.english: Cut two small, curved ears from brown construction paper and glue them near the top of the mask.
sentences.chinese: 用棕色工作用紙剪出兩個耳朵，並粘貼在面具上方。

sentences.english: She doesn't end the mask stuck to Comus' chair.
sentences.chinese: 她並未理會粘在科瑪斯座椅上的面具。

sentences.english: The world puts off his masks of vastness to his lover.
sentences.chinese: 世界對着他的愛人，把它浩瀚的面具掲下了。

sentences.english: Warriors such as the Samurai have traditionally used masks to intimidate their enemies.
sentences.chinese: 傳統上，日本的武士用面具來威嚇他們的仇敵。

sentences.english: When seeing people, I happened to recognized them as devils with masks of human-beings.
sentences.chinese: 見人就如見了帶了面具的魔鬼。

sentences.english: They wear ski masks and carry pistols and machine guns.
sentences.chinese: 他們戴着滑雪面具，攜帶手槍和衝鋒槍。

sentences.english: The most odious of all oppressions are those which mask as justice.
sentences.chinese: 最可憎的壓制總是戴着正義的面具。

sentences.english: Two masked men held up a mail van.
sentences.chinese: 兩個戴面具的人攔路搶劫了一輛郵車。

sentences.english: Beneath this mask there is an idea, Mr. Creedy.
sentences.chinese: 需要問一個戴面具的人是誰嗎？

definition: face flannel or towel/shroud (over the face of a corpse)
